channel.title: I need help :D
channel.description: Heyy there, i have a problem..... i got a blank 317 (source and client) got it coded for me and people to join if they had my hamachi ip, but i cant make shops because theres no place to put them because its blank can someone help me with this first person to get me successful get a mod spot on my server thanks please reply soon <33

item.title: I need help :D
item.dc:creator: @Clunky Clunky
item.description:
@Clunky wrote:

emtrescue you are right in fact i got it off of dl’s in forums…
anyone have a clue

Read full topic

item.title: I need help :D
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:403710”][quote author=Clunky link=topic=500775.msg3663086#msg3663086 date=1310453936]
[/quote]

All you have to do is define your shop (probably shops.cfg), then in the NpcActionHandler packet, add a case for your Npc, and tell it to open the shop.[/quote]

sounds more like he doesnt even have a regular -base- he has a blank its not delta pi or anything. that he is asking how to add shops from scratch how to code it in to tell the game what is a shop, not to simply add it in shops.cfg spawnsfg and action handler , i could be wrong though

Read full topic

item.title: I need help :D
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Clunky, post:1, topic:403710”]Heyy there,
i have a problem…
i got a blank 317 (source and client)
got it coded for me and people to join if they had my hamachi ip,
but i cant make shops because theres no place to put them because its blank
can someone help me with this
first person to get me successful get a mod spot on my server thanks
please reply soon <33[/quote]

All you have to do is define your shop (probably shops.cfg), then in the NpcActionHandler packet, add a case for your Npc, and tell it to open the shop.

Read full topic
